Title: Grasp revolution, increase production, relentlessly strike at imperialism, revisionism and reactionaries!
Designer: Xiang Yangwen (向阳文)Political Department of the Zhejiang Provincial Military Command of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军浙江省军区政治部)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmn meishu chubanshe (浙江人民美术出版社)
Notes: The slogan top left: 抓紧革命大批判! (Firmly grasp large-scale revolutionary criticism!). The small caricatures bottom right: possibly a Russian, Uncle Sam and Chiang Kai-shek.
